imports.nstMintRec: address: receiver of minted NST tokens
imports.nstMintAmt: uint256: amount of tokens to mint
imports.vestTot: uint256: total amount of the vesting stream
imports.vestBgn: uint256: timestamp of the beginning of the vesting stream
imports.vestTau: uint256: duration of the vesting stream in seconds
imports.vestEta: uint256: duration of the cliff of the vesting stream in seconds
